abstract: Arden Asset Management, the hedge fund of funds manager, said Thursday that it had struck a deal with JPMorgan Chase to manage a $1.1 billion portfolio of hedge funds for its investment banking unit.
snippet: Arden Asset Management, the hedge fund of funds manager, said Thursday that it had struck a deal with JPMorgan Chase to manage a $1.1 billion portfolio of hedge funds for its investment banking unit.
lead_paragraph: Arden Asset Management, the hedge fund of funds manager, said on Thursday that it had struck a deal with JPMorgan Chase to manage a $1.1 billion portfolio of hedge funds for its investment banking unit.

headline.main: Arden to Manage JPMorgan Hedge Fund Assets
